name: MAGIC SKETCH-A-TRON 3000
description:
A little puzzle game inspired by popular 90s kid toys - magnetic drawing boards.

CONTROLS:
Use the sliders to hide or show elements on the map to allow the little guy reach the flag of each level.

The roundy things are portals! When the little guy reaches them, he comes out on the other side. If there is more than one pair of portals they will be labeled by letters.

Four levels total, have fun!

Game made by:
Szymon Licau
Łukasz Kiełczykowski
